# payconductor-sdk.Model.PostOrdersRequestSession
If externalSessionId or sessionId is provided and an existing session exists, it will be updated with the new data. Otherwise, a new session will be created.

## Properties

Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**ExpiresInMinutes** | **decimal** | Time in minutes for checkout session expiration | [optional] [default to 30M]
**CheckoutUrl** | **string** | Checkout URL for redirection | [optional] 
**SessionId** | **string** | ID generated by our service to identify the checkout session | [optional] 
**ExternalSessionId** | **string** | Checkout session ID generated by the client side. The ID must be unique for each cart session | [optional]
